Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: Cylindrical vase with wide mouth, straight pointed rim and stable base with somewhat concave bottom. Paste of an orangey colour. Interior and exterior surface bear traces of whitish coating. On the interior and exterior rim a painted decoration is to be seen, consisting of a red-coloured band which encircles the piece.
